Source code for dashboard.models

from tabnanny import verbose
from django.db import models
from django.contrib.gis.db import models

# Create your models here.



[docs]class ADMN1DATA(models.Model):
    county_name = models.CharField(max_length=30, null=True)
    county_code = models.CharField(primary_key=True, max_length=6)
    geom = models.MultiPolygonField(srid=4326, null=True)

    class Meta:
        verbose_name_plural = "Administration Level One"



def __str__(self):
    return self.county_name



[docs]class ADM2DATA(models.Model):
    sub_county_name = models.CharField(max_length=30)
    county_name = models.CharField(max_length=30)
    geom = models.MultiPolygonField(srid=4326)

    class Meta:
        verbose_name_plural = "Administration Level Two"



def __str__(self):
    return self.subcounty_name



[docs]class ADM3DATA(models.Model):
    county_name = models.CharField(max_length=30)
    sub_county_name = models.CharField(max_length=30)
    ward_name = models.CharField(max_length=30)
    geom = models.MultiPolygonField(srid=4326)

    class Meta:
        verbose_name_plural = "Administration Level Three"



def __str__(self):
    return self.subcounty_name



[docs]class CropCalenders(models.Model):
    country_name = models.CharField(max_length=30)
    crop = models.CharField(max_length=30)
    stage = models.CharField(max_length=30)
    startDate = models.DateField()
    endDate = models.DateField()

    class Meta:
        verbose_name_plural = "Crop Calender information"



def __str__(self):
    return self.country_name
